block.comment: search for all Payments for this vendor for the specified year (get year from NetSuite Variables lookup table).Â Â If the topic specifies the SEARCH_ID and PAGE NUMBER, use them in the NetSuite search

block.name: insert_row
block.title: Insert row in netsuite_1099_payment
block.description: Insert row in netsuite_1099_payment table in MySQL
block.comment: Insert new Payment row to MySQL Payment table (store date and payment total) with default status "bills-search"

First make sure all the Payments are recorded in MySQL (so that we don't think all payments were processed if Workato processes the first payment before the rest of the Payments/Payment-Bills were entered)

block.name: insert_row
block.title: Insert row in netsuite_1099_payment_bill
block.description: Insert row in netsuite_1099_payment_bill table in MySQL
block.comment: Insert every payment-billÂ  with in the payment appli list in SQL table with default status "bill-search"

block.name: update_rows
block.title: Update rows in netsuite_1099_vendor
block.description: Update rows in netsuite_1099_vendor table in MySQL
block.comment: then mark this Vendor as calculated byÂ updating the status for the Vendor to "vendor-calculated"

block.name: call_service_async
block.description: Call recipe Pub-Sub Util - Clear Tracking for Pub-Sub (do not wait for response)

dynamicPickListSelection.flow_id: Pub-Sub Util - Clear Tracking for Pub-Sub

properties.label: Key
properties.name: key
properties.hint: This is the unique identifier for the search you want to track (e.g. for retrieving all payments for a specific vendor the key would be vendor.[internal_id])

block.comment: No payments means no further tracking needed for this vendor

block.name: call_service
block.description: Call recipe Pub-Sub Util - Update Tracking for Pub-Sub

dynamicPickListSelection.flow_id: Pub-Sub Util - Update Tracking for Pub-Sub

properties.label: Key
properties.name: key
properties.hint: This is the unique identifier for the search you want to track (e.g. for retrieving all payments for a specific vendor the key would be vendor.[internal_id])

properties.label: Total expected requests
properties.name: total_expected_requests
properties.hint: When tracking the pub-sub requests, this is the total expected number (e.g. if you are using pub-sub to go through pages of a NetSuite saved search, this would be the total number of pages)

block.name: publish_to_topic
block.description: Publish message to NetSuite Search Request PubSub topic

properties.label: Search ID
properties.name: search_id
properties.hint: The Search ID for a specific search you want to use

properties.label: Page number
properties.name: page_number
properties.hint: The specific page to retrieve when specifying the Search ID

block.comment: If there are no payments for the Vendor AND there are no other pages to search
If the SEARCH_ID was not present (meaning this was the initial request for doing the search), then make requests for the rest of the pages in this search

block.name: call_service_async
block.description: Call recipe Pub-Sub Util - Add Request for Pub-Sub Tracking (do not wait for response)

properties.label: Key

properties.hint: This is the unique identifier for the search you want to track (e.g. for retrieving all payments for a specific vendor the key would be vendor.[internal_id])

properties.name: value
properties.hint: Unique identifier for request (if tracking pages in a NetSuite Search Request, then this would be the page number)
